page.title: 07THE A6 ROAD
page.content: Most people object to the noise of traffic on the A.6, but some are glad of it because it helps them to get to and from work quickly. Old people are frightened because they cannot cross the road fast enough. There should be more play areas for children to keep them off the roads. It is a very busy road and there is a lot of noise, even at night when people are in bed. People often shop away from the A.6 because it is so busy. In Disley the A.6 cuts the village in half and there is only one pelican crossing. by Heidi Cunnah, Karen Bramwell and Gary Morgan.
